articles.description: In the past five years, HBO has amplified Black visibility with Insecure, Random Acts of Flyness, Lovecraft Country, and A Black Lady Sketch Show. Between the World and Me now joins the roster, adapting Ta-Nehisi Coates’ nonfiction bestseller for a socially d…
articles.content: As coronavirus rates have surged, production for numerous upcoming TV shows and films has been halted worldwide. But social-distancing precautions didnt discourage journalist and author Ta-Nehisi Coa… [+7757 chars]

articles.author: By Natasha Hooper For Mailonline
articles.title: Paris Hilton marks 14-year anniversary of 'inventing the selfie' in a snap alongside Britney Spears - Daily Mail
articles.description: The reality star, 39, celebrated the anniversary of the throwback picture with the Toxic hitmaker, 38, on Friday as she dubbed them both 'legends' and claimed she invented the selfie.
articles.content:
She is credited with having paved the way for a host of reality stars, including Kim Kardashian and Kylie Jenner.  
And Paris Hilton boldly declared herself the inventor of the selfie, as she shared… [+4506 chars]
